articles.title: Watch Live: Indian-American astronaut Raja Chari conducting spacewalk to upgrade solar panels on I.S.S - Times Now
articles.description: During the 6.5hr long spacewalk, Astronauts Kayla Barron and Raja Chari, who are the part of the crew of Expedition 66, will assemble and install modification kits required for upcoming solar array upgrades.

articles.author: Sophie Mellor
articles.title: COVID-19 lockdowns accidentally cut cases of another killer disease to historical lows - Fortune
articles.description: Public health measures designed to slow the spread of spread of COVID-19 have unexpectedly cut the number of Dengue fever cases in Latin America and Southeast Asia by almost half.

articles.title: China says it wants to avoid US sanctions over Russia's war - The Star Online
articles.description: BEIJING (Bloomberg): China wants to avoid being impacted by US sanctions over Russia’s war, Foreign Minister Wang Yi said, in one of Beijing’s most explicit statements yet on American penalties that are contributing to a historic market selloff.
